copper_ore.Name: 粗铜
copper_ore._Description: Cook it well to produce {name currency copper}.
copper_ore.Description: 好好烹饪以产生{name currency copper}。

iron_ore.Name: 粗铁
iron_ore._Description: Toast it to produce {name currency iron}.

stone.Name: 石头
stone._Description: Favored by artists for their crunchy possibilities.
stone.Description: 因其酥脆的可能性而受到艺术家青睐。

sand.Name: 沙子
sand._Description: It's roarse, and cough, and it gets eherweyeve!
sand.Description: 粗糙，令人咳嗽，到处都是！

coal.Title: 煤炭
coal.Name: 卡尔
coal.Description: 在每场游戏中都担任辅助角色。

stone.Title: 石头
stone.Name: 斯库特
stone._Description: Likes rocks. Has a bottomless bag.
stone.Description: 喜欢岩石。拥有一个无底袋。

copper_ore.Title: 粗铜
copper_ore.Name: 尤金
copper_ore._Description: Trapped in a dead-end job. Literally.
copper_ore.Description: 被困在死胡同工作中。字面意思。

growth.Title: 生长
growth.Name: 珀西
growth._Description: Drinks apple and banana smoothies every day!
growth.Description: 每天都喝苹果香蕉奶昔！

joule.Title: 焦耳
joule.Name: 野津子
joule.Description: 在[s]推特[/s] X 上关注特斯拉。

concrete.Title: 混凝土
concrete.Name: 桑托斯
concrete.Description: 任何事情都能让他发笑。

ad.Title: 广告
ad.Name: 阿提库斯
ad._Description: Has purchased "Disable all Ads" in more than 25,000 games.
ad.Description: 在超过 25,000 款游戏中购买了“禁用所有广告”。

battle_pass.Title: 战斗通行证
battle_pass.Name: 乔治奥
battle_pass._Description: Grinds the same game every day. Doesn't enjoy life all that much.
battle_pass.Description: 每天都在同一个游戏里刷刷刷。生活没什么乐趣。

deluxe.Title: 豪华版
deluxe.Name: 麦克斯韦
deluxe._Description: Doesn't even like video games, but sure does love spending money!
deluxe.Description: 甚至不喜欢电子游戏，但确实很爱花钱！

whale.Title: 鲸鱼
whale.Name: 奥森
whale._Description: Recoups in 10 milliseconds what he throws away.
whale.Description: 在 10 毫秒内就能赚回他扔掉的钱。

axe.Title: 斧头
axe.Name: 阿莱克西亚
axe._Description: IN THE YEAR 202070707020. I AM WAKAKO.

carcinogen.Title: 致癌物
carcinogen.Name: 拉马什
carcinogen._Description: His only purpose in life is to cause pain and mayhem.
carcinogen.Description: 他人生的唯一目的就是制造痛苦和混乱。

cigarette.Title: 香烟
cigarette.Name: 乔治
cigarette._Description: On his 45th smoke break this shift.
cigarette.Description: 这班已经第 45 次抽烟休息了。

galena.Title: 方铅矿
galena.Name: 杰克
galena._Description: Almost went down the {name lored iron_ore} path but then discovered construction!
galena.Description: 差点走上{name lored iron_ore}的道路，但后来发现了建筑！

hardwood.Title: 硬木
hardwood.Name: 兔子
hardwood._Description: She was born with her hard hat already equipped.
hardwood.Description: 她出生时就已经戴着安全帽了。

humus.Title: 腐殖质
humus.Name: 雅克
humus._Description: The shittiest character in the game.

lead.Title: 铅
lead.Name: 马丁
lead._Description: Works all the time at a soul-sucking job and daydreams of never having been born.
lead.Description: 一直在做着折磨心灵的工作，幻想着从未出生过。

liquid_iron.Title: 铁水
liquid_iron.Name: 男孩
liquid_iron._Description: Failed in home economics and later became a master soup savant!
liquid_iron.Description: 家政课不及格，后来成为了汤羹大师！

paper.Title: 纸张
paper.Name: 索耶
paper._Description: Was in the boy scouts for 25 years.

petroleum.Title: 石油
petroleum.Name: 蒂米
petroleum._Description: Once rode [i]Thunder Mountain Railroad[/i] [b]500[/b] times in a row!
petroleum.Description: 曾经连续乘坐[i]雷鸣山铁路[/i] [b]500[/b] 次！

seed.Title: 种子
seed.Name: 梅比
seed._Description: Sounds scary but is a nice guy!
seed.Description: 听起来很吓人，但其实是个好人！

tumor.Title: 肿瘤
tumor.Name: 杰西
tumor._Description: Makes new accounts after being banned.
tumor.Description: 被封号后会创建新账号。

water.Title: 水
water.Name: 佳得乐
water.Description: 在自己的游泳池里看书。

wood.Title: 木材
wood.Name: 悟克塔
wood._Description: Cut one down for the legends who ain't with us anymore.
wood.Description: 为那些已经不在我们身边的传奇砍下一棵。

unlock_coal.Name: 煤炭 LORED
unlock_coal._Effect Text: Unlock {name lored coal}, 即 {title lored coal} LORED
unlock_coal.Effect Text: 解锁 {name lored coal} 即 {title lored coal} LORED

unlock_iron_ore._Effect Text: Unlock {name lored iron_ore}, 即 {title lored iron_ore} LORED
unlock_iron_ore.Effect Text: 解锁 {name lored iron_ore} 即 {title lored iron_ore} LORED

unlock_copper_ore.Effect Text: 解锁 {name lored copper_ore} 即 {title lored copper_ore} LORED

unlock_safety_wheel.Name: 到底咋回事
unlock_safety_wheel._Effect Text: Unlock the safety wheel, the jobs viewer, and the widget panel.
unlock_safety_wheel.Effect Text: 解锁安全轮、工作查看器和小部件面板。

how_is_this_an_rpg._Name: How is this an RPG anyway?
how_is_this_an_rpg.Name: 这到底算不算 RPG？
how_is_this_an_rpg._Description: Tip: LOREDs roll at the beginning of every job for a chance to multiply their output by their {icon die} [color=WHITE]critical multiplier!
how_is_this_an_rpg.Description: 提示：LORED 会在每个工作开始时掷骰子，有机会将其产出乘以其 {icon die} [color=WHITE]暴击倍数[/color]！

unlock_growth.Name: 生长 LORED
unlock_growth._Effect Text: Unlock {name lored growth},NEWLINEthe {title lored growth} LORED
unlock_growth.Effect Text: 解锁 {name lored growth} 即 {title lored growth} LORED

unlock_joule._Effect Text: Unlock {name lored joule},NEWLINEthe {title lored joule} LORED
unlock_joule.Effect Text: 解锁 {name lored joule} 即 {title lored joule} LORED

unlock_concrete.Effect Text: 解锁 {name lored concrete} 即 {title lored concrete} LORED

unlock_oil._Effect Text: Unlock {name lored oil},NEWLINEthe {title lored oil} LORED
unlock_oil.Effect Text: 解锁 {name lored oil} 即 {title lored oil} LORED

unlock_tarball.Name: 解锁肉团
unlock_tarball._Effect Text: Unlock {name lored tarball},NEWLINEthe {title lored tarball} LORED
unlock_tarball.Effect Text: 解锁 {name lored tarball} 即 {title lored tarball} LORED

unlock_malignancy.Name: 解锁恶性肿瘤
unlock_malignancy._Effect Text: Unlock {name lored malignancy},NEWLINEthe {title lored malignancy} LORED
unlock_malignancy.Effect Text: 解锁 {name lored malignancy} 即 {title lored malignancy} LORED

pro_consumer.Name: 专业消费者机制
pro_consumer._Description: Tip: You can view and change Upgrade Tree tabs at the top of the Upgrades Window.
pro_consumer.Description: 提示：你可以在升级窗口的顶部查看和切换升级树标签页。

skulls.Name: 骷髅
skulls.Effect Text: {name stage main1} LORED 输出和输入 [b]×EffectText[/b]

so_close._Name: we were so close, now you don't even think about me
so_close.Name: 我们曾经如此接近，现在你甚至不再想起我
so_close.Effect Text: 自动购买 {name tree 1a} 升级

unlock_juice.Name: 解锁果汁
unlock_juice._Effect Text: Unlocks {name currency juice} and the {name tree 1unique}
unlock_juice.Effect Text: 解锁 {name currency juice} 和 {name tree 1unique}
unlock_juice._Description: {name lored growth} gains the ability to brew {name currency juice}. He will [b]alternate[/b] between producing {name currency growth} and {name currency juice}.NEWLINEIf there is sufficient {name currency juice} available, LOREDs will drink, becoming temporarily [color=#6bf521][b]Juiced[/b][/color], the effects of which you can find in the {icon tree 1unique} [b]Details[/b] widget on the right.NEWLINELOREDs will stop producing {name currency juice} once there is enough in the pot for all LOREDs to drink. If you [b]watch[/b] {name currency juice} in the [b]Currency[/b] window (hotkey: C), you can view this target amount.
unlock_juice.Description: {name lored growth} 获得了酿造 {name currency juice} 的能力。他将[b]交替[/b]生产 {name currency growth} 和 {name currency juice}。NEWLINE如果有足够的 {name currency juice} 可用，LORED 会喝掉它们，暂时变得[color=#6bf521][b]果汁满满[/b][/color]，其效果可以在右侧的 {icon tree 1unique} [b]详情[/b]小部件中找到。NEWLINE一旦锅中有足够的果汁供所有 LORED 饮用，LORED 就会停止生产 {name currency juice}。如果你在[b]货币[/b]窗口（快捷键：C）中[b]关注[/b] {name currency juice}，你可以查看这个目标数量。

copious.Name: 丰富
copious._Description: Tip: Unlike other resources, {name currency juice} production is [b]not[/b] affected by a LORED's Output.
copious.Description: 提示：与其他资源不同，{name currency juice} 的生产[b]不[/b]受 LORED 输出的影响。

big_gulp.Name: 大口喝
big_gulp._Description: Tip: Fill amount does [b]not[/b] affect how much {name currency juice} is spent, only how much is added into a LORED's tummy.
big_gulp.Description: 提示：填充量[b]不[/b]影响花费多少 {name currency juice}，只影响添加到 LORED 肚子里的量。

piracy.Name: 盗版
piracy.Effect Text: 最低 [b]果汁满满[/b] 输入 [b]×EffectText[/b]

jam.Name: 酱
jam.Effect Text: 最大 [b]果汁满满[/b] 输出 [b]+EffectText[/b]

coursing.Name: 追踪赛
coursing._Effect Text: Juice in the tummy multiplies Output and Input
coursing.Effect Text: 输出和输入乘以肚子里的果汁

jonesin.Name: 瘾君子
jonesin._Description: This value scales linearly up to 2.0 based on the amount of Juice missing from the LORED's tummy.
jonesin.Description: 该值根据 LORED 肚子里缺少的果汁量线性缩放，最高可达 2.0。

contingency.Name: 应急措施
contingency._Effect Text: Crits do not consume Juice from the tummy
contingency.Effect Text: 暴击不会消耗肚子里的果汁

rage_juice.Name: 感染了什么？
rage_juice._Description: {name lored growth} gains the ability to brew {name currency rage_juice}. He will not do so if the current amount of {name currency juice} is below the target amount.NEWLINEIf there is sufficient {name currency rage_juice} available, LOREDs will drink, becoming [color=#ff392a][b]Enraged[/b][/color] for 6 seconds, the effects of which may be viewed in the {icon tree 1unique} [b]Details[/b] widget on the right.
rage_juice.Description: {name lored growth} 获得了酿造 {name currency rage_juice} 的能力。如果当前的 {name currency juice} 数量低于目标数量，他将不会这样做。NEWLINE如果有足够的 {name currency rage_juice} 可用，LORED 会喝掉它们，变得[color=#ff392a][b]怒气勃勃[/b][/color] 6 秒，其效果可以在右侧的 {icon tree 1unique} [b]详情[/b]小部件中查看。

grr_im_mad.Name: 啊呜我忒么的生气了
grr_im_mad.Effect Text: 最大 [b]狂怒[/b] 持续时间 [b]+EffectText[/b]

molasses._Name: slower than molasses drips off a spoon :)
molasses.Name: 比糖浆从勺子上滴下还慢 :)
molasses.Effect Text: 最低 [b]果汁满满[/b] 加速 [b]×EffectText[/b]

fast_as_fuck.Name: 快抽了，盆友！
fast_as_fuck.Effect Text: 最大 [b]果汁满满[/b] 加速 [b]+EffectText[/b]

tree_1unique_autobuy._Name: If you want something done right, you [s]do it yourself[/s]let the autobuyer do it!
tree_1unique_autobuy.Name: 如果你想把事情做好，你就[b]让自动购买器来做[/b]！
tree_1unique_autobuy.Effect Text: 自动购买 {name tree 1unique} 升级

lored_autobuyer._Name: What in the idle game is this?!
lored_autobuyer.Name: 放置游戏里这是什么？！
lored_autobuyer.Effect Text: 解锁 LORED 自动购买器

coal_milkshake.Name: 我喝你的奶昔！
coal_milkshake._Effect Text: Output multiplier [i]for [/i]{name lored coal}NEWLINEIncreases based on his level whenever {name currency coal} is usedNEWLINECurrently: [b]x%s[/b]
coal_milkshake.Effect Text: {name lored coal} 输出倍数NEWLINE每当使用 {name currency coal} 时，都会根据其等级增加NEWLINE当前值：[b]×%s[/b]

aw.Name: 啊！<3
aw.Effect Text: {name lored coal} 免费获得 1 级

enthusiasm.Name: 热情
enthusiasm.Effect Text: {name stage main1} LORED 输出和输入 [b]×EffectText[/b]

purpose.Name: 目标
purpose.Effect Text: 最低 [b]果汁满满[/b] 加速 [b]×EffectText[/b]
purpose._Description: [center][i][b]TLDR[/b]: [b]SLOWER[/b], but [b]STRONGER[/b]![/i][/center]NEWLINEOutput will be multiplied by 2 times the number of 0.1s less than the maximum Haste rolled. For example, if the Juiced Haste range is 0.15 - 1.5 and the LORED rolls 0.15, his Output will be multiplied by [b]26[/b], because there are 13 0.1s between 0.15 and 1.5.
purpose.Description: [center][i][b]简而言之[/b]：更[b]慢[/b]，但更[b]强[/b]！[/i][/center]NEWLINE输出将乘以比最大加速值少 0.1 的数量的 2 倍。例如，如果果汁满满的加速范围是 0.15 - 1.5，而 LORED 掷出了 0.15，那么他的输出将乘以 [b]26[/b]，因为在 0.15 和 1.5 之间有 13 个 0.1。

its_growin_on_me.Name: [shake rate=20 level=10]它在我身上生长[/shake]
its_growin_on_me._Effect Text: Maximum Output multiplier based on {name lored growth}'s levelNEWLINE[i]for [/i]{name lored iron} [i]and[/i] {name lored copper}NEWLINECurrently: [b]x%s[/b]
its_growin_on_me.Effect Text: {name lored iron} 和 {name lored copper} 的最大输出倍率基于 {name lored growth} 的等级NEWLINE当前 [b]×%s[/b]

capacity_for_evil.Name: 作恶的能力
capacity_for_evil._Effect Text: Max Juice multiplies Output and Input
capacity_for_evil.Effect Text: 输出和输入乘以最大果汁

commune.Name: 公社
commune._Description: There is a small chance each time a LORED finishes a job [i]while Juiced[/i] to increase this effect.
commune.Description: 每当 LORED 在[i]果汁满满[/i]时完成一项工作时，都有很小的几率增加此效果。

rise_and_juice.Name: 崛起与果汁

rise_and_juice.Effect Text: 任何 {name stage main1} LORED 都可以酿造 {name currency juice}

upgrade_name.Name: upgrade_name

upgrade_name.Effect Text: {name stage main1} LORED 输出倍率 [i]增加[/i] 2.0 {icon arrow_right_line} 2.1

TREE_2A_AUTOBUYER._Name: ain't no way im clicking all these every prestige

snap.Name: 啪嗒
snap._Description: Whenever a LORED scores a crit, they will draw cards and earn {plural_name currency chip} based on the score of their hand.
snap.Description: 每当 LORED 得到暴击时，他们将根据手牌的分数抽牌并赚取 {name currency chip}。

yay_gambling.Name: 耶，赌博！
yay_gambling.Effect Text: {name stage main2} LORED 暴击几率 [b]+EffectText%[/b]

JIGGITIES.Name: 绝绝子
JIGGITIES._Effect Text: Multiply {name lored hardwood}'s Output by [b]1.1[/b]NEWLINEif the first two cards of a hand are [b]Jacks[/b]NEWLINECurrently: [b]x%s[/b]
JIGGITIES.Effect Text: 如果手牌的前两张牌是 [b]J[/b]，则将 {name lored hardwood} 的输出乘以 [b]1.1[/b]NEWLINE当前 [b]×%s[/b]

THE_ANSWER.Name: 答案
THE_ANSWER._Effect Text: If the first two cards of a hand are [b]4[/b] and [b]2[/b],NEWLINEall LOREDs gain [b]+1[/b] hand size for 42 seconds
THE_ANSWER.Effect Text: 如果手牌的前两张牌是 [b]4[/b] 和 [b]2[/b]，则所有 LORED 的手牌上限 [b]+1[/b]，持续 42 秒

ALL_BARK.Name: 全是树皮
ALL_BARK._Effect Text: Multiply {name lored tree}'s Output by [b]1.025[/b]NEWLINEif the first two cards of a hand are [b]King[/b] and [b]9[/b]NEWLINECurrently: [b]x%s[/b]
ALL_BARK.Effect Text: 如果手牌的前两张牌是 [b]K[/b] 和 [b]9[/b]，则将 {name lored tree} 的输出乘以 [b]1.025[/b]NEWLINE当前 [b]×%s[/b]

digit.Name: 数码
digit._Effect Text: Gain Crit Chance equal to theNEWLINE[i]first digit[/i] of the latest Chip gain
digit.Effect Text: 获得等于最新 {name currency chip} 收益的NEWLINE[i]首位数码[/i] 的暴击几率

roi.Name: 投资回报率
roi.Effect Text: 暴击倍率 [i]倍率[/i]NEWLINE(log(10 + 最新 {name currency chip} 收益))

BEST_HANDS.Name: 最佳手牌
BEST_HANDS.Effect Text: 解锁 [b]最佳手牌[/b] 小部件
BEST_HANDS._Description: The top 5 of your 20 best hands will be featured in this widget. Their {name currency chip} earnings will be totaled at the top. Rarer hands will persist in this widget for longer.
BEST_HANDS.Description: 你最好的 20 手牌中的前 5 手将显示在此小部件中。它们的 {name currency chip} 收益将总计在顶部。稀有手牌将在此小部件中持续更长时间。

BEST_HANDS_MULT._Effect Text: {name currency chip} multiplier based onNEWLINEthe sum from your [b]Best Hands[/b]

A_CHANCE.Effect Text: 如果手牌的前两张牌是 [b]2[/b] 和 [b]7[/b]，则将手牌的 {name currency coin} 收益乘以 [b]27[/b]

JACKPOT_SEVENS.Effect Text: [b]幸运的 7[/b] 将你当前的 {name currency chip} 的 [b]7.77 倍[/b] 添加到 {name currency jackpot}

WINNER_WINNER.Effect Text: [b]超级幸运的 7[/b] 将 {name currency jackpot} 乘以 [b]7,777[/b]

ADVANTAGE.Name: 优势

ADVANTAGE_COIN.Name: 蓝色特权

UNLOCK_DICE.Name: 幸运骰子
